description:
100% Open Source Toolkit for Large Language Models: Train, Tune, Chat on your own Machine

Transformer Lab is a free, open-source LLM workspace that you can run on your own computer. It is designed to go beyond what most modern open LLM applications allow. Using Transformer Lab you can easily finetune, evaluate, export and test LLMs across different inference engines and platforms.
Highlights
- Visualize model activations on MLX and Fastchat!
- Plugins: update all at once, show which are supported on your architecture
- Enhanced model provenance
- Improvements to pre-training to support making larger models
- Many backend bug fixes
This release also introduces a pretty significant update to how we handle tasks on the backend that will allow us to launch a powerful workflow GUI in the next couple of releases!
Full github log
- Workflow by @sanjaycal in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/336
- fix add recipe from yaml with tasks by @sanjaycal in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/339
- Show if a plugin will work on your machine by @aliasaria in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/337
- Fix eval screen by @sanjaycal in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/340
- Filter by experiment ID by @sanjaycal in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/342
- Fix/improve embeddings page by @aliasaria in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/341
- Add model activations in Interact tab by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/343
- Fix generate and eval modal for enabling editing and proper tab display by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/344
- Add MLX server in the under construction sign for Model Activations by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/345
- Fix/remove calls to node process to make cloud app work by @dadmobile in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/347
- Add/update-all-plugins-button by @aliasaria in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/348
- Fix things broken by Tasks by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/346
- Add prettier as default formatter for javascript stuff by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/349
- Enhance how model provenance looks and make it working for chains by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/350
- Add code to update Run button state on experiment update to avoid UI delay by @dadmobile in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/351
Full Changelog: https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/compare/v0.11.2...v0.12.0
